You may interact with certain features of the online services that cause information to be published to your social networks. For example, you may click on a Facebook "like" button, which publishes to your Facebook account that you "like" one of our TV shows or movies. On pages of the online services that contain social network functionality, the social network providing the functionality may be able to collect information about you, even if you don't use that functionality. For example, if a page within the online services contains a Facebook "like" button, Facebook may be able to collect data about your visit to that page, even if you don't click on the "like" button.
